name: Hotel Novotel Den Haag City Centre

reviews.text: Consistent novotel experience, with well priced family room for four, including a huge and varied buffet breakfast. would single out the reception and bar staff for special praise, they were unfailingly pleasant and had very good local knowledge. Room plain and functional with good shower.the position of the hotel is good, near trams and all city centre sites. Parking is limited and expensive, but that is expected for a city centre hotel. Would warn anyone coming to de Haggai (or holland?) at new year, the noise on NYSE was the worst ever, fireworks and.bangers for two hours solid. But kids slept through it mad we did ok.
reviews.title: Usual excellent novotel family stay

reviews.text: I have spent almost a week at this hotel. I must say the location is fantastic, just opposite the Binnenhof, with many restaurants around and in the same block of the famous shop gallery called Passage. The rooms facing the street have a nice view of the city, even at night.
reviews.title: Novotel service at the very best location in The Hague

description: The Novotel Den Haag City Centre is a 4 star hotel in the monumental Haagse Passage shopping arcade in the very heart of The Hague.The hotel is located opposite the Binnenhof (The Dutch parliament) and within walking distance of museums and shopping streets.The central location makes it ideal for a business stay or weekend away. Our cosy rooms feature paid WiFi and complimentary high speed internet. The hotel also offers meeting rooms,a bar, restaurant and parking garage.The hotel is 100% non smoking
